title: Convert Term to Whole Life Insurance
description: A policyholder with a convertible term life policy wants to convert it to a whole life policy.

tasks.description: Identify the policyholder and verify their term policy has a conversion option.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the policy is eligible for conversion.

tasks.description: Explain the features of the new whole life policy, including the higher premium and cash value accumulation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the differences and benefits of the new policy.

tasks.description: Process the conversion paperwork and provide the new policy documents and premium schedule.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully processes the policy conversion.
